channel.title: solution regarding outlook security
channel.description: I use outlook mail. But all the time my mail is full of spam mail. I take help from the support team of outlook technical support to solve the problem but again after some days I am facing same problem. Is there any process to stop getting the spam mail and increase the security of my accpunt.

item.title: solution regarding outlook security
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi john6655

The forum is used for Whonix / anonymity support questions only. Since using Microsoft outlook is not Whonix specific, please search for an answer using your current support resource.

Note: It is strongly recommended to use open-source software from a trusted and verifiable source. Not proprietary software such as Microsoft outlook.

Related:

Whonix

E-Mail

Anonymous Email. Thunderbird. Remailer. Encryption. Mixmaster. Nym.

Whonix

Install Software

Installing additional Software on Whonix. Safety considerations.

Read full topic
